sentences: Jeesus on 체ks kristliku usu keskne isik.
Kristlased usuvad Jeesusest kui Jumala Poja ja p채채stjat.
context: The Estonian word 'jeesus' means Jesus, referring to the central figure of Christianity. It is used in religious contexts to refer to Jesus Christ, the Son of God and Savior in Christian belief. The word can also appear in exclamations similar to English expressions like 'Oh my Lord!' when expressing surprise, amazement, or other strong emotions.
